import React from 'react' import { useCounter } from '../../hooks/useCounter' import { useFetch } from '../../hooks/useFetch' import '../02-useEffect/effects.css' export const Layout = () =>{ const {counter,increment} = useCounter(1); const {data} = useFetch(`https://www.breakingbadapi.com/api/quotess/${counter}`); const {author , quote} = !!data && data[0] return (

-kayout effect

{quote}

{author}
) }
